name: Ani-Hopper
description:
The creatures who dwell in the Melonimal Realm will be the primary characters in the game, and with the darkness of the witch Melyssa, the tranquility in the land of the Animals will come to an end. Melonimal is filled with evil and misery as a result of her presence. Land and convert the city into a magma sea, then construct your own fortress. The courageous warriors rose to their feet and challenged the castle to fight Melyssa, the witch.

Disclaimer

Hi there! I made this demo  Endless  game project for  game design class (GI492) in major of Game and Interactive media  from Bangkok university Thailand. Feel free to give us feedback about what you like and what you think .

How To Play  Credit
